Test Case Name: Reset Password - Rate limiting on reset requests
Preconditions: System tracks password reset requests per IP or user; not locked initially.
Test Steps: 1. Repeatedly initiate password reset for the same account 2. Do this up to the defined limit 3. Attempt one more reset 4. Observe the rate limit message and temporary block
Expected Result: System shows rate limit message and blocks further reset attempts for a cooldown period
